item.title: About Me
item.description: Who am I? What am I? Why am I? I am a technie with a passion for linux and all things technology - so I tend to spend a considerable amount of time online. When I am not wired in, I typically enjoy calorie-intense activities which involve running, jumping, throwing stuff, and hitting people. Current Status Statistical analysis mini-project with a buddy of mine for the upcoming elections. This blog is still a work in progress.
